events.message: I am reporting a car accident that happened yesterday afternoon when another vehicle collided with my rear bumper at a stoplight.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident. The incident involves a collision with another vehicle causing minor damages.
An agent specialized in vehicle accident claims has been assigned to your case to coordinate the next steps and investigations.
Your claim for the auto accident has been acknowledged successfully. We are committed to assisting you throughout this process.
Please provide photographs of the vehicle damage, police report, and your driverâ€™s license to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including images of the damaged car and police report have been submitted for review and processing.
The investigation into your auto accident claim has begun, focusing on verifying collision details and extent of vehicle damages.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and damage assessment consistent with the provided incident details.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on repair estimates and applicable coverage under your insurance policy.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the timely handling of their vehicle damage claim and clarity of the settlement terms.
Your claim has been approved officially, enabling us to proceed with the reimbursement for vehicle repairs promptly.
The payment for the vehicle repair costs has been processed and should appear in your account within 3 to 5 business days.
The auto accident claim has been closed following successful payment of settlement and confirmation of repair completion.
The records for your recent auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference and audit purposes.
